The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 February is 3,469,231 (6,163.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 03 February, there were 125,341 new confirmed cases (222.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 January, there were 166,130 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 25% (40,789 fewer cases).
